title: Riot won't buff Doran's shield because they don't want melee champs to be able to win

replies.body:
Yes, that story can join the other true stories, like Paul Bunyan, and the Fountain of Youth!

It may be that "I think, so therefore I am" but that is a far cry from "I think, so therefore it is true".
So much flawed logic.... Must resist
By "melee champions" he means Yasuo and by "win" he means win even harder.

{{champion:114}} {{champion:39}}{{champion:240}} ??

I guess no one told these champions that.
